column13:
Fabindia Women's Leggings Price: Rs.441

Airy mangalgiri pure handloom cotton is used to tailor this classic Indian style pants. These churidars are characterized by the fitted gathering of extra fabric along the lower portion of the legs. Further it loosens into a relaxed drawstring waist. Traditionally worn with a kurta or kameez which is a tunic-style top
column14: churidars are a fantastic look with any length top.
